author: Neil Munro
title: New York City Wants Taxpayer Bailout for Low Wage Migrant Economy
description: Taxpayers should bail out the low-wage migrant workers who support the city's elite economy during the coronavirus pandemic, according to a report by the city's comptroller, Scott Stringer.
content:
Taxpayers should bail out the low-wage migrant workers who support the city’s elite economy during the coronavirus pandemic, according to a report by the city’s comptroller, Scott Stringer.
